Name: BEWBEWBEW
About the game: BEWBEWBEW is a lovingly crafted, unique, and colorful action-arcade game! Completely original fighting system! Charge spawns before releasing them in one big wave. Fights are all about optimizing your move usage to hit as many spawns as possible. A ton of playable characters and abilities! 50+ characters, each with their own set of abilities from a pool of 150+ unique moves of different types, elements, and usage. No two characters play the exact same! Partake in intense 1-vs-1 and whole party fights! Each side can have up to 3 party members. Hectically switching between your party members to burn through all your Energy and cooldowns is key! Hand-drawn graphics! Nearly every sprite and background in this game was drawn on paper first before being digitally colored, all done to make the art pop out. Combine different attacks for devastating effects! Set embers ablaze to start a fire! Place down a lightning rod before using a shock attack to do massive damage! Plant seeds and grow spiky roses! Play through 70+ fun levels, including a challenging Adventure mode! Some levels have unique twists and conditions. Be ready for anything! Endless Classic mode! Unlock characters and play through an endless gauntlet of levels as your power up your party!
